summary: Consume messages from a Kafka topic.

parameters.name: topic
parameters.description: Name of the queue or topic to consume messages from.

parameters.name: group id
parameters.description: ID of the consumer group for Kafka.

parameters.name: use schema registry
parameters.description: Whether to use Confluent Schema Registry for message schema management.

parameters.name: schema registry url
parameters.description: URL of the schema registry to use.

parameters.name: options
parameters.description: Additional options for Kafka consumer configuration.
